content.html: Been thinking a lot recently about how lucky I was to have had some excellent mentors and some solid advice whilst I was finding my feet as a junior developer I love that Twitter gives us all a platform to learn and pass that advice forward
content.value:
Been thinking a lot recently about how lucky I was to have had some excellent mentors and some solid advice whilst I was finding my feet as a junior developer

I love that Twitter gives us all a platform to learn and pass that advice forward
